      • Mqtt

        public Mqtt(String serverURI,
            String clientId,
            String userName,
            String userPassword,
            IotHubSSLContext iotHubSSLContext)
     throws IOException
        Constructor to instantiate mqtt broker connection.
        Parameters:
        serverURI - the server uri associated with this mqtt broker connection
        clientId - the client Id associated with this mqtt broker connection.
        userName - the user name for the mqtt broker connection.
        userPassword - the user password for the mqtt broker connection.
        iotHubSSLContext - the iothub SSL context
        Throws:
        IOException - if failed to set the mqtt information
